title: Low Priority Queue after leaving custom game with bots
body:
I left a Custom game 6 minutes ago and to my surprise I'm all of a sudden in a low priority queue.
Why, Do Custom games have repercussions now?

replies.body: LeaverBuster does not punish for custom games. You punishment was caused by leaving or AFKing in a matched game.
but i got  low higher priority que from costom game i think there may be a bug now in the game that register costom game as a normal game
It was a 5v5 Co-op vs AI game. It wasn't a custom game. You were playing Warwick.
WHY ARE YOU BANNING PEOPLE FOR AFKING IN A BOT GAME???
If you want a BOT game, create a custom game with 9 other bots. A Co-op vs AI game is a MATCHED game with 4 other real players.
Just wondering, but if a Co-op vs AI game is a matched game, does it complete quests like the PROJECT: quests?

It's a bit late to help now but hope the info comes in handy later.  Yes, Co-op vs AI does count as a matchmade game.  That said, you need to read the quest text carefully.  Some tasks can only be completed in Summoner's Rift or other specific game modes.  Custom does not work for this obviously.

But say the one where you need to place 4 control wards in a matchmade game?  Co-Op vs AI would work.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=p3VIss7L,comment-id=00010003000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-27T18:41:42.085+0000)
>
> If you want a BOT game, create a custom game with 9 other bots. A Co-op vs AI game is a MATCHED game with 4 other real players.

only it isn't what with the MASSIVE amount of bots that you seem to do nothing to ban....

Regardless of this particular instance, Riot should get rid of the "you may get banned" message that still appears when you leave custom games. People who haven't read comments like this on the forums probably think that they have to always finish out their customs.

But i had no Low priority Queue Before The custom game i had only received it after i had left the custom game cause your servers are bad. And  before that i had not left a game in over 2 weeks and that was also because my internet had a slow connection toward Riot servers. If you would please understand the truth behind me id be glad to say nice things about riot servers about how they "crash cause you live in Canada" Well unfortunately Riot made a game and its one of the 3 games i can stand to play.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotTantram,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=p3VIss7L,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-18T03:02:12.305+0000)
>
> LeaverBuster does not punish for custom games. You punishment was caused by leaving or AFKing in a matched game.

Ouch
it also happens to me when i leave costum games...wtf
